00001 /*****************************************************************************
00002  * Project: BaBar detector at the SLAC PEP-II B-factory
00003  * Package: 
00004  *    File: $Id: BdkPdfAbsBase.rdl,v 1.3 2005/12/04 00:21:10 abi Exp $
00005  * Authors:
00006  *   WW, Wolfgang Walkowiak, UC Santa Cruz, walkowia@scipp.ucsc.edu
00007  * Description:
00008  *   Abstract base class for pdfs which define their own variables.
00009  *   To be used in conjunction with RooFitCore/Models.
00010  * History:
00011  *   18-Mar-2002 WW Created initial version
00012  *   17-Sep-2002 WW Bug fix for SunOS 5.8 compiler.
00013  *
00014  * Copyright (C) 2001 University of California and SLAC
00015  *****************************************************************************/
00016 #ifndef BDKPDFABSBASE
00017 #define BDKPDFABSBASE
00018 
00019 #include "TNamed.h"
00020 #include "TString.h"
00021 
00022 class RooAbsArg;
00023 class RooAbsPdf;
00024 class RooArgSet;
00025 class RooAbsCollection;
00026 class RooDataSet;
00027 
00028 
00029 class BdkPdfAbsBase : public TNamed
00030 {
00031   // Static members:
00032 public:
00033   // The static dependents list is needed in order for parameters() to return
00034   // only RRV's that are not on the list, since RooAbsArg doesn't provide
00035   // a way to find all the dependents without some input:
00036   static const RooArgSet * allAnalysisVars() {return _allAnalysisVars;}
00037   static void setAllAnalysisVars(RooArgSet * vars) {_allAnalysisVars = vars;}
00038 
00039 private:
00040   static const RooArgSet * _allAnalysisVars;
00041   
00042 
00043   // Instance members:
00044 public:
00045     BdkPdfAbsBase();
00046 
00047     virtual ~BdkPdfAbsBase();
00048 
00049     virtual RooAbsPdf *getPdf();
00050     
00051     virtual RooArgSet *getArgSet();
00052     
00053     virtual RooAbsArg *find(const char *name);
00054     
00055     virtual Bool_t getIsValid() const;
00056 
00057     // Subclasses should use this to return all their dependent RooRealVars:
00058     virtual RooArgSet dependents() = 0 ;
00059 
00060     virtual RooArgSet parameters();
00061 
00062     virtual RooArgSet parametersFree(Bool_t freeOnly = kTRUE);
00063 
00064     virtual RooDataSet* generate(Int_t nEvents, RooDataSet* protoDataSet=0);
00065 
00066     virtual void fixAll(Bool_t val = kTRUE);
00067 
00068     virtual void setVerbose(const char * val);
00069     
00070     inline const TString & verbose() {return _verbose;};
00071 
00072     inline Bool_t pdfOwned() const {return _pdfOwned;}
00073 
00074 protected:
00075     
00076     virtual void setPdf(RooAbsPdf & thePdf, Bool_t owned = kTRUE);
00077     
00078     virtual void setIsValid(Bool_t isValid);
00079 
00080     virtual void baseInit(const char *theName,
00081                           const char *theDesc); 
00082     
00083     // Initialization of RooRealVars, etc. Put here as a reminder:
00084     virtual void initParameters();
00085     
00086     // Creates the _thePdf. Called from getPdf() to ensure that _thePdf
00087     // is ready when it's needed:
00088     virtual void createPdf() = 0;
00089 
00090     virtual RooAbsArg* findReplace(RooAbsArg& arg, RooAbsCollection& set);
00091     
00092 private:    
00093 
00094     BdkPdfAbsBase(BdkPdfAbsBase & pdf);
00095     BdkPdfAbsBase & operator=(BdkPdfAbsBase & pdf);
00096 
00097     void deletePdf();
00098 
00099 public:
00100 
00101 protected:
00102     // resulting pdf
00103     RooAbsPdf* _thePdf;
00104 
00105 private:    
00106     // validity of resulting pdf
00107     Bool_t _isValid;
00108     TString _verbose;
00109     Bool_t _pdfOwned;
00110     
00111     ClassDef (BdkPdfAbsBase,0) // Pdf wrapper base on top of RooFitCore
00112 };
00113 
00114 #endif
